en.title: [3Q 2024] Labour Market Review
en.description: Quarterly review of Malaysian labour markets, drawing from the labour force, productivity, employment, jobs, and wage releases.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly labour market review, covering labour force, productivity, employment, and wage indicators.

bm.title: [ST3 2024] Sorotan Pasaran Buruh
bm.description: Sorotan suku tahunan pasaran buruh Malaysia, berasaskan penerbitan tenaga buruh, produktiviti, guna tenaga, jawatan, dan gaji.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan sorotan pasaran buruh suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi indikator tenaga buruh, produktiviti, guna tenaga, dan gaji.
